short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 60 firm deliverables, and 120 client options of the 2.5'' 4TB Hard Drives.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) Solicitation No.:                   2BH2127621/DDepartment:                          Department of National Defence Notification Period:              17 days (28/11/2022 to 14/12/2022) Description of Requirement:The Department of National Defence has a requirement for 60 firm deliverables, and 120 client options of the 2.5’ 4TB Hard Drives, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.Delivery Destination Area:            Ottawa, Ontario           Delivery Date:    60 federal government working days from contract award.
tags: Automatic Data Processing Equipment, System Configuration
